p:
More recently, the development of clevudine as a treatment for CHB was terminated because of case reports of myopathy
26 . Fleischer RD et al. found that the drug was not incorporated into mtDNA and was not an inhibitor or a substrate for DNA polymerase; therefore, mitochondrial toxicity was not expected
26, 27 . However, mitochondrial toxicity may arise not only from inhibition of DNA polymerase, but also from mtDNA mutations and mitochondrial oxidative stress
26, 28 .
